00025 class cuda_runtime_ex : cupp::exception {
00026         private:
00027                 // the error
00028                 cudaError_t error_;
00029         public:
00034                 cuda_runtime_ex(cudaError_t error): error_(error) {}
00035                 char const* what() const throw() {
00036                         return cudaGetErrorString(error_);
00037                 }
